Ground modifiers: 30% vs. Light, Dolphins and Giant Squids
100% vs. all infantry armor types and Drone
85% vs. (Big) Light Structure and ((Very) Big Defensive Structure
Air modifiers: 45% vs. Light Aircraft and Medium Aircraft
35% vs. Heavy Aircraft, Thor Gunships,Cryocopters,Alanqa SkystationsandQuetzals
15% vs.Hailjets,Ospreys,Hornet UAVs,Dybbuk-Interceptors, Quetzal drones,Leviathandrones andShrike drones
Ability: Deploy to use hold position which increases the armor of friendly ground units (except teleporting and naval units) in a radius of 4 around the Thor Gunship by 50% but halves their speed for 450 frames (30 in-game seconds)
The Thor Gunship cannot attack while the hold position is in effect
Has a cooldown of 600 frames (40 in-game seconds)
Notes: Receives a 20% firepower buff while inside aLightning Rod's radius
Causes 45-22.5 damage in a radius of 2 at where the Thor Gunship crashes when shot down
